title: Emiliano Zapata
summary: Emiliano Zapata Salazar (Spanish pronunciation: [emiˈljãno saˈpata]; 8 August 1879 – 10 April 1919) was a Mexican revolutionary. He was a leading figure in the Mexican Revolution of 1910–1920, the main leader of the people's revolution in the Mexican state of Morelos, and the inspiration of the agrarian movement called Zapatismo.
